Directions: In a small bowl, combine the coconut, almonds, sugar, flour and salt. Stir in egg whites and extract. Line a baking sheet with foil; grease foil well. Spread coconut mixture into a 9-in. circle on foil. Bake at 325 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate overnight.
Place the crust on a serving plate; spread with whipped cream. Combine peaches and sugar; spoon over cream. Cut into wedges. Serve immediately.
Ingredients: 4 cups sliced fresh or frozen peaches, thawed
